title: NVIDIA Wants More Programming Languages to Support CUDA
author: Agam Shah
description: The CUDA parallel computing platform can be programmed with C++, Fortran and Python, but the company is looking for others to run its GPUs.
cntitle: NVIDIA 希望更多编程语言支持 CUDA
cndescription: CUDA 并行计算平台可以使用 C++、Fortran 和 Python 进行编程，但该公司正在寻找其他人来运行其 GPU。
